author: newsr.in
title: Amazon Prime Instant Video Now Lets iOS And Android Owners Download Titles For Offline Viewing
text: Amazon took a big step today to differentiate its Prime Instant Video service from rival Netflix: it’s becoming the first subscription-based video streaming service to make its content available for offline viewing on iOS and Android devices. Previously, the company allowed Amazon Fire tablet customers to download videos, but that didn’t address its sizable customer base who… Read More »
